Arguments.Name: String1
Arguments.Tooltip: First input string.  Especially effective for short strings.

Arguments.Name: String2
Arguments.Tooltip: Second input string. Especially effective for short strings.

Arguments.Name: JDistance
Arguments.Tooltip:
Jaro Distance as Double. A higher Jaro distance (closer to 1) means the strings are more similar.
A lower Jaro distance (closer to 0) means the strings are less similar.

Arguments.Name: DissimilarSymbolDictionary
Arguments.Tooltip: Dictionary of dissimilarities. Keys are Int32 and define position that uses one-based indexing (position 1 key is 1, 2 is 2 etc), and Values are the dissimilar symbol as String in that position.
